meta.title: Operation of Blood Pressure Recording Apparatus

sections.purpose: To measure and record systemic arterial blood pressure in experimental animals.
procedure: Calibrate the pressure transducer and chart recorder.
Anesthetize the animal and cannulate the carotid or femoral artery.
Connect the cannula to saline-filled tubing and the pressure transducer.
Zero the transducer at arterial level.
Administer test compound and record changes.
Euthanize the animal humanely at the end of the experiment.
Clean and sterilize all reusable components.
precautions: Flush lines regularly to prevent clotting.
